paper_abstract: The Hosoya index of a graph G is the total number of matchings of G, including the empty edge set. Let B(n, Delta) be the set of connected n-vertex bicyclic graphs with maximum degree Delta. We determine the greatest Hosoya index in B(n, Delta), and characterize the corresponding extremal graphs.
paper_title: The Greatest Hosoya Index of Bicyclic Graphs with Given Maximum Degree
